chunk:
Gaia Skincare Naturally Face Moisturiser

Brand: GAIA Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, helianthus annuus (sunflower) oil, cetyl alcohol, cetearyl alcohol, *pelargonium graveolens water, glycerol stearate, sodium steroyl lactylate, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, prunus dulcis (almond) oil, simmondsia sinensis (jojoba) oil, theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, *prunus armeniaca (apricot) oil, phenoxyethanol, benzyl

steroyl lactylate, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, prunus dulcis (almond) oil, simmondsia sinensis (jojoba) oil, theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, *prunus armeniaca (apricot) oil, phenoxyethanol, benzyl alcohol, dehydroacetic acid, *citrus limonum (lemon) oil, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) oil, *boswellia carterii (frankincense) oil, tocopherol

Directions: Apply to cleansed and toned skin, using a small amount warm in your hands and apply over face and neck area. Use light sweeping movements upwards to ensure even application.

Warnings: If irritation occurs discontinue use. Keep product cool and out of direct sunlight.

Warnings: If irritation occurs discontinue use. Keep product cool and out of direct sunlight.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
